fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE 
APPLY TO: DIGITAL MARKETING EXECUTIVE 
Work Experience 
Marketing Executive and website technical executive at Viet 
Media Travel company 
The period working : 1/2018 – Present 
Job description 
➢ Analyze competitor’s activities and give new ideas for 
company’s marketing campaign 
➢ Work with other departments to build marketing plans 
➢ Work with partners to provide the necessary conditions 
for company’s marketing plans 
➢ Research and update new digital marketing trends and 
strategies that are evolving 
➢ Implement company’s marketing plans: 
- 
Come up with design and content ideas 
- 
Ads setup and optimization (facebook ads, google 
ads…) 
- 
Track, monitor and make appropriate adjustments 
- 
Report performance of trade marketing plans 
➢ Analyze monthly marketing performance and propose 
action plans 
➢ Build and manage email newsletter campaigns 
➢ Manage, SEO and write attractive content for website 
➢ Additional: Support the team to perform company events 
Inbound tour guide at Saigon Adventure company 
The period worked: 2017 – 2018 
Job description 
➢ Guidance to foreign tourists to learn about the culture, 
people and some famous destination in Ho Chi Minh city 
Marketing staff at Hospi Travel company 
The period worked : 11/2015 –7/2016 
Job description 
➢ Search for useful travel information and write content for 
website 
➢ Give ideas to develop the company’s products 
VĂN THỊ PHƯƠNG HÀ 
Personal information 
Phone:  
Email:  
Address: District 7 
Birthday:  
Place of birth: Tay Ninh province 
Gender: Female 
Marital status: unmarried 
Religion: non-religion 
Hobbies & Goals 
Hobbies 
➢ Travel around the 
world 
➢ Meet new people, try 
new things, discover 
new places 
➢ Reading book 
Future goals 
➢ Become an excellent 
marketer 
➢ Next 10 years: Start 
open a shop and 
business 
Certificate

by Ton Duc Thang University 
Education 
➢ Graduated in tourism major at Ton Duc Thang university 
➢ Studied a short course on computer skills at Ton Duc 
Thang university 
➢ Studied a course on English communication at Saigon 
Adventure education center 
➢ Studied a short course on marketing tools at Vinalink 
Media

Teamwork 
Communication skills 
Independent working 
Computer skills 
English skills 
➢ Listening 
➢ Speaking 
➢ Reading & understanding 
➢ Writing 
Manage time 
Thinking skills and creativity 
Ability to concentrate 
Analyze and evaluate problems skills
